entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
